channel.title: Recent Executive Orders
channel.description: Latest Executive Orders from the White House

item.title: Protecting American Investors from Foreign-Owned and Politically-Motivated Proxy Advisors
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose.

item.title: Ensuring a National Policy Framework for Artificial Intelligence
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose.

item.title: Addressing Security Risks from Price Fixing and Anti-Competitive Behavior in the Food Supply Chain
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1.

item.title: Launching the Genesis Mission
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose.

item.title: Designation of Certain Muslim Brotherhood Chapters as Foreign Terrorist Organizations and Specially Designated Global Terrorists
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including the Immigration and Nationality Act

item.title: Modifying the Scope of Tariffs on the Government of Brazil
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including the International Emergency

item.title: Modifying the Scope of the Reciprocal Tariff with Respect to Certain Agricultural Products
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including the International Emergency

item.title: Fostering the Future for American Children and Families
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered:

item.title: Modifying Reciprocal Tariff Rates Consistent with the Economic and Trade Arrangement Between the United States and the People’s Republic of China
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including the International Emergency

item.title: Modifying Duties Addressing the Synthetic Opioid Supply Chain in the People’s Republic of China
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including the International Emergency
